price: 57. (Fircoon) wuxuu yidhi: “Ma waxaad noogu timid inaad nooga saarto dhulkayaga sixirkaaga Muusow?.
arabic: قَالَ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتُخۡرِجَنَا مِنۡ أَرۡضِنَا بِسِحۡرِكَ يَٰمُوسَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla aji'tanā litukh'rijanā min arḍinā bisiḥ'rika yāmūsā
